record_type.description: Identifies the type of the resource.

quantity.description: The amount of SIM cards requested in the SIM card order.

cost.description: An object representing the total cost of the order.

amount.description: A string representing the cost amount.

id.description: Uniquely identifies the address for the order.

first_name.description: The first name of the shipping recipient.

last_name.description: The last name of the shipping recipient.

business_name.description: The name of the business where the address is located.

street_address.description: The name of the street where the address is located.

locality.description: The name of the city where the address is located.

administrative_area.description: State or province where the address is located.

country_code.description: The mobile operator two-character (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) origin country code.

order_address.description: An object representing the address information from when the order was submitted.

tracking_url.description: The URL used to get tracking information about the order.

status.description:
The current status of the SIM Card order.
  • pending - the order is waiting to be processed.
  • processing - the order is currently being processed.
  • ready_to_ship - the order is ready to be shipped to the specified address.
  • shipped - the order was shipped and is on its way to be delivered to the specified address.
  • delivered - the order was delivered to the specified address.
  • canceled - the order was canceled.

created_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date-time indicating when the resource was last created.

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date-time indicating when the resource was last updated.
